title: Inquiry-Based Modeling Course for Branching Diagram Reconstruction

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of differential equations, function graph interpretation, and understanding system behavior based on parameter changes
context.additional_context: Small-group collaborative learning environment using digital devices (tablets/laptops). Emphasizes creative problem-solving through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Students can reconstruct the mathematical structure of decision diagrams through a three-stage inquiry task
Learners can visualize system dynamics according to parameter changes and provide analytical explanations
Teams can submit project deliverables discovering bifurcation points of nonlinear systems through collaborative modeling processes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
